attributes.action: How long does it take to have off the wall mind blowing sex that will leave your partner weak in the knees and like putty in your hands ? Sponsor NHS provided sex therapies as follows
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
